rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: An inviting entrance with a reception area featuring natural light, stone accents and greenery.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious area combining living room, dining space and open kitchen. Large windows and French doors ensure abundant natural lighting and ventilation as per Vastu principles. Decorative Bohemian elements with vibrant colours and textures.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A generous master bedroom featuring a private balcony to enhance natural light and ventilation. Bohemian decor with a mix of vintage furniture and contemporary touches.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room with ample space, adorned in a Bohemian style that complements the house's overall aesthetic.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace that integrates modern design elements and ensures sufficient natural light and ventilation. Suitable for a bachelor pad.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: An en-suite bathroom for the master bedroom with Vastu-aligned placement, ensuring privacy and functionality.

openings.details: Large glass door with security features, allowing abundant natural light in the entrance lobby.
Seamless transition from indoor space to the expansive garden and swimming pool area.
Spacious balconies offering direct view of the garden, enhancing natural light and promoting a Bohemian aesthetic.
